doc:
Joe Harris (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Harris_(actor) 0 Joe Harris (January 11, 1870 - June 11, 1953) was an American actor, who between 1913 and 1923 appeared in at least 94 silent films, many of them cowboy westerns. He often played villains opposite early cowboy star Harry Carey. Joe_Harris ( January_11_,_1870 - June_11_,_1953 ) was an_American_actor , who between 1913_and_1923 appeared in at_least_94_silent_films , many of them cowboy_westerns . He often played villains opposite_early_cowboy_star_Harry_Carey .
